member.name: T:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader
member.summary: Represents a reader that provides fast, non-cached, forward-only access to CSV data.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader.DefaultBufferSize
member.summary: Defines the default buffer size.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader.DefaultDelimiter
member.summary: Defines the default delimiter character separating each field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader.DefaultQuote
member.summary: Defines the default quote character wrapping every field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader.DefaultEscape
member.summary: Defines the default escape character letting insert quotation characters inside a quoted field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader.DefaultComment
member.summary: Defines the default comment character indicating that a line is commented out.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._fieldHeaderComparer
member.summary: Contains the field header comparer.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._reader
member.summary: Contains the pointing to the CSV file.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._bufferSize
member.summary: Contains the buffer size.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._comment
member.summary: Contains the comment character indicating that a line is commented out.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._escape
member.summary: Contains the escape character letting insert quotation characters inside a quoted field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._delimiter
member.summary: Contains the delimiter character separating each field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._quote
member.summary: Contains the quotation character wrapping every field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._trimmingOptions
member.summary: Determines which values should be trimmed.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._hasHeaders
member.summary: Indicates if field names are located on the first non commented line.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._defaultParseErrorAction
member.summary: Contains the default action to take when a parsing error has occured.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._missingFieldAction
member.summary: Contains the action to take when a field is missing.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._supportsMultiline
member.summary: Indicates if the reader supports multiline.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._skipEmptyLines
member.summary: Indicates if the reader will skip empty lines.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._initialized
member.summary: Indicates if the class is initialized.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._fieldHeaders
member.summary: Contains the field headers.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._fieldHeaderIndexes
member.summary: Contains the dictionary of field indexes by header. The key is the field name and the value is its index.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._currentRecordIndex
member.summary: Contains the current record index in the CSV file. A value of means that the reader has not been initialized yet. Otherwise, a negative value means that no record has been read yet.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._nextFieldStart
member.summary: Contains the starting position of the next unread field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._nextFieldIndex
member.summary: Contains the index of the next unread field.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._fields
member.summary: Contains the array of the field values for the current record. A null value indicates that the field have not been parsed.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._fieldCount
member.summary: Contains the maximum number of fields to retrieve for each record.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._buffer
member.summary: Contains the read buffer.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._bufferLength
member.summary: Contains the current read buffer length.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._eof
member.summary: Indicates if the end of the reader has been reached.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._eol
member.summary: Indicates if the last read operation reached an EOL character.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._firstRecordInCache
member.summary: Indicates if the first record is in cache. This can happen when initializing a reader with no headers because one record must be read to get the field count automatically

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._missingFieldFlag
member.summary: Indicates if one or more field are missing for the current record. Resets after each successful record read.

member.name: F:LumenWorks.Framework.IO.Csv.CsvReader._parseErrorFlag
member.summary: Indicates if a parse error occured for the current record. Resets after each successful record read.

if field names are located on the first non commented line, otherwise, .
The delimiter character separating each field (default is ',').
The quotation character wrapping every field (default is ''').
The escape character letting insert quotation characters inside a quoted field (default is '\'). If no escape character, set to '\0' to gain some performance.

Determines how values should be trimmed.

if spaces at the start and end of a field are trimmed, otherwise, . Default is .
